parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "Singularity",
  "details": {
    "software": [
      "Singularity",
      "Python",
      "Ray",
      "Nvidia-modprobe",
      "awk"
    ],
    "resources": {
      "cores": 16,
      "nodes": 1,
      "memory": "64G",
      "partition": "gpu",
      "gpu": 1,
      "environment_variables": [
        "ITER_PER_EPOCH",
        "NUM_CPUS",
        "RAY_ROOT"
      ],
      "files": [
        "deoxys-ray.sif",
        "experiment.py",
        "post_processing.py",
        "run_test.py"
      ],
      "folders": [
        "$HOME/datasets/headneck",
        "$TMPDIR/$USER/hn_delin",
        "/net/fs-1/Ngoc/hnperf/$2",
        "$SCRATCH/hnperf/$2",
        "$SCRATCH/analysis/$2"
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

This script utilizes the Singularity container technology to execute Python scripts for machine learning. The script leverages resources like GPUs and multiple CPU cores for training and testing a model. It also manages files and folders for data storage and analysis.
